messages.messageBody:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

December 4, 2003

EducationalFreedom.com Special Offer

EducationalFreedom.com publisher, Donna M. De Poalo, in an effort to
increase awareness, and encourage support, of the efforts to defeat
proposed federal legislation, H.R. 2732, is giving away free access
to Educational Freedom Press through January 30, 2004.

Please use the following link and instructions to access the site:

Entry Page: http://educationalfreedom.com/efp/issues
User Name: subscriber
December Password: 5252
January Password: 6868

If you have any questions or to learn more about
EducationalFreedom.com please visit the site at:
http://educationalfreedom.com

----------------------------------------------------------------------

EducationalFreedom.com Weekly News Update is a service of
EducationalFreedom.com, a reader supported publication and web site.

Please consider making a donation:
http://educationalfreedom.com/pages/support.html



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
